introduction: A community of clay characters are working in an unchanging way around a ladder. The repetition of gestures ensures the continuity of the enterprise and underlines the metaphorical aspect of the situation..."With this film Alain Ughetto links laughter of the eyes and intelligence of the mind. Absolutely remarkable. We would like the 8 minutes to go on indefinitely, so complete is the pleasure it brings us: we will not hesitate to place it at the top of the festival."(Le Dauphiné Libéré, About Cannes 81)
